Package userprofile

Class UserProfileServiceTest

java.lang.Object
userprofile.UserProfileServiceTest
public class UserProfileServiceTest extends Object
Holds tests for the methods implemented for GitHubAPI that are related to the user profile feature
Author:
Pradnya Kandarkar

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    static void
    setUp()
    Creates an application for testing purpose and overrides the binding to use mock implementation instead of the actual implementation.
    void
    should_ReturnEmptyArray_when_GitHubUserWithNoPublicRepos()
    Checks if an empty JSON array node is returned when getUserRepositories is called for an existing GitHub username having no public repositories
    void
    should_ReturnNotFoundResponse_when_NotGitHubUser()
    Checks if a "Not Found" response is returned when getUserProfileByUsername is called for a username which is not registered with GitHub
    void
    should_ReturnProfileInfo_when_GitHubUser()
    Checks if a valid response is returned when getUserProfileByUsername is called for an existing GitHub username
    void
    should_ReturnReposArray_when_GitHubUserWithPublicRepos()
    Checks if a valid non-empty JSON array node is returned when getUserRepositories is called for an existing GitHub username having at least one public repository
    void

    Checks if a "Not Found" response is returned when getUserRepositories is called for a username which is not registered with GitHub

  • Method Details

    • setUp

      public static void setUp()
      Creates an application for testing purpose and overrides the binding to use mock implementation instead of the actual implementation. Sets up an embedded server for testing.

    • tearDown

      public static void tearDown() throws IOException
      Performs clean up activities after all tests are performed
      Throws:
      IOException - If the call cannot be completed due to an IO error

    • should_ReturnProfileInfo_when_GitHubUser

      public void should_ReturnProfileInfo_when_GitHubUser() throws Exception
      Checks if a valid response is returned when getUserProfileByUsername is called for an existing GitHub username
      Throws:
      Exception - If the call cannot be completed due to an error

    • should_ReturnNotFoundResponse_when_NotGitHubUser

      public void should_ReturnNotFoundResponse_when_NotGitHubUser() throws Exception
      Checks if a "Not Found" response is returned when getUserProfileByUsername is called for a username which is not registered with GitHub
      Throws:
      Exception - If the call cannot be completed due to an error

    • should_ReturnReposArray_when_GitHubUserWithPublicRepos

      public void should_ReturnReposArray_when_GitHubUserWithPublicRepos() throws Exception
      Checks if a valid non-empty JSON array node is returned when getUserRepositories is called for an existing GitHub username having at least one public repository
      Throws:
      Exception - If the call cannot be completed due to an error

    • should_ReturnEmptyArray_when_GitHubUserWithNoPublicRepos

      public void should_ReturnEmptyArray_when_GitHubUserWithNoPublicRepos() throws Exception
      Checks if an empty JSON array node is returned when getUserRepositories is called for an existing GitHub username having no public repositories
      Throws:
      Exception - If the call cannot be completed due to an error

    • should_ReturnReposNotFoundResponse_when_NotGitHubUser

      public void should_ReturnReposNotFoundResponse_when_NotGitHubUser() throws Exception
      Checks if a "Not Found" response is returned when getUserRepositories is called for a username which is not registered with GitHub
      Throws:
      Exception - If the call cannot be completed due to an error
